content: **new re-edited version - 2020-07** =============================== since its release in 2012 the stitch surfer has travelled on a multitude of needles around the world with this design louise robert has offered a construction that is out of the ordinary highlighted by original and exclusive hand-dyed yarns more than 8 years after the initial release of the stitch surfer socks here at biscotte yarns we are pleased to offer you a re-edited version by its designer take advantage of this free pattern and don t forget to use the hashtag #stitchsurfer 1 if you share your photos on instagram we want to see you catch the wave ---------------------------------------- **yarn** biscotte yarns bis-sock 85% superwash merino 15% nylon 435yds/400m per 100g skein 1 1 1 skein each of mc semi-solid or speckled color and cc self-striping color knitting kits available here 2 sample shown was knitted with bis-sock self-striping lichen and super sock speckled inverness from louise robert design **needles & notions** us #1 5/2 5 mm of circular or dpn needles tapestry needle **gauge** 32 sts/46 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch **sizes** small medium large **finished measurements** sock circumference 8 5 9 5 10 5 inches foot and leg lengths are adjustable samples shown have leg 9 inches long measured from the bottom of the heel la version française est disponible sur leslainesbiscotte com 3 1 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/stitchsurfer/ 2 https //biscotteyarns com/products/knitting-kit-stitch-surfer-socks 3 https //leslainesbiscotte com/products/patron-bas-stitch-surfer
